name: Pachinko Daisakusen 2
overview: Pachinko Daisakusen 2 is the second game in its series for the Famicom. It is still about playing pachinko, but the premise is a little bit different. The game takes on more of a detective theme, in that you must use clues provided to you, in order to catch up to another agent. Of course, that involves playing quite a bit of pachinko! There are four stages this time, which may seem short, but it really comes down to luck after a while.
